title: A visit to the web3.0 world
description: Learn how to travel and stroll around a web application built in the web3 world!

title: What is a smart contract?
description: Understand what a web3.0's smart contract is.

title: Using GNS3 to learn SDN
description: Setup and configure your GNS3 with required elements to learn, develop and test Software Defined Networks.

title: How complex can authorization get?
description: Builds on the Authorization component of Identity and Access Management system from zero to how systems are implemented today

title: Introduction to API Security
description: Learn what is API security and how Postman can be used in automatic security testing of APIs

title: Man-in-the-middle: A tale of a hoax DHCP server
description: Learn how a user can act like a hoax DHCP server and situate himself as a man in the middle, and how one can prevent such attacks

title: How Secure are your APIs?
description: Learn API security testing in action using Postman

title: Modelling Trust Frameworks for Network-IDS
description: Mathematically modelling human instinctive trust among systems to communicate security based trust reduction and redemption message

title: How I do Machine Learning at work
description: A method used among group of data scientists to identify and refine feature set for a machine learning problem

title: Tamper Detection and Correction of ELF Binaries by Remote Parties via via Merkle Trees
description: Efficiently identifying and patching malicious software using merkle trees before the first execution by the user

title: DHCP starvation attack without making any DHCP requests
description: Most defense systems filter out repeated DHCP requests. What if you could perform DHCP starvation without sending a DCHP request?

title: Gain access to an internal machine using Port forwarding: Penetration testing
description: Set up a penetration testing environment using docker containers in docker networks to learn various types of port forwarding techniques

title: ARP Spoofing using Scapy
description: Learn and try out ARP spoofing all by yourself in a Docker network using Scapy!

title: Math Behind Euclid's Theorem
description: Wondered why Euclid's GCD theorem works?
